name: Governor
description:
The king has chosen you as the new governor of a distant and uninhabited region.

Your task is simple, you have to build up and develop the region and transform it in a prosperous land . But the king is an impatient ruler, he wants results and wants them fast so you will need to work without a rest. Build an impressive castle to show the king the power of your region.

Build houses, farms, churches, and other buildings, manage the resources and face multiple events in your way to become one of the greatest governors.
